value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, that's a brief overview of the
Order of Heroes. We're really looking
forward to working with you!$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|So, just to make sure I got all of that,
you're a group that hires the best
mercs from across all sorts of worlds.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, you're not exactly right, but
you're not entirely wrong, either...$k$pWe might employ plenty of Heroes,
but we aren't a professional army,
and many Heroes aren't mercenaries.$k$pInstead, we're a group united by a
single purpose: to bring lasting peace
and stability to the Kingdom of Askr.$k$pI hope you'll all be able and willing to
contribute to that cause.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝エスト,ch10_34_Est_F_Normal,Face|My older sisters are in, so I'm in too!$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|We're not the sort to look away when
we see someone in need. Ain't that
right, priestess?$k$p$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|Hm? Oh, yes... Of course...$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|Something on your mind?$k$p$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|Oh, no. Don't mind me.$k$pCommander... I hope you will allow
me to render aid in the manner I
deem most appropriate.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|Long as I get paid for my work, it
doesn't much matter to me who's
doing the paying. I'm in.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Phew, that's really great to hear.
We need all the help we can get!$k$p$EFace|Oh, uh...I should add that I have
a somewhat...special request of sorts
for Princess Celica in particular.$k$p$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|For me? What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I ask this of every new Alm and Celica
who finds their way to Askr, so don't
take it personally, but...$k$p$EFace_Pain|If you happen to come upon wooden
boxes or urns out in the field, um...
Be sure not to break them, OK?$k$p$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|Oh, uh... Certainly. I will keep that
in mind.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Great! For some reason, you're the
only ones from Valentia who even
notice the crates around Askr.$k$pBut every time you do, you and Alm
get this crazy look in your eyes and
just smash them to pieces!$k$p$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|Yes, well... It's almost like there's
an unseen force guiding our hand...$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Kamui, have you seen the priestess?$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|Oh, she said something about taking
a stroll around the castle grounds
to clear her head.$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|That so...$k$p$WmMPID_外伝エスト,ch10_34_Est_F_Normal,Face|Hey... Did everyone else know that
the priestess is actually a princess?
Of Zofia, right?$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|I knew she was far from ordinary, at
the very least. She's probably just got
a lot of things on her mind.$k$pI told her that fighting necrodragons
makes me weak in the knees, but
it's like she clean forgot...$k$p$WmMPID_外伝エスト,ch10_34_Est_F_Normal,Face|Did you ever suspect that she was
royalty, though? I mean, she does
have a certain grace...$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|If it wasn't for her kindness and
bravery, my brothers would still be
at the mercy of bandits.$k$pThat she was a princess all along
came as no surprise to me. She acted
as a true ruler should.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|Speaking of which, is it just me,
or did she seem kind of...off earlier?$k$p$WmMPID_外伝エスト,ch10_34_Est_F_Normal,Face|Maybe the commander was a little
too overbearing with her request?
It WAS kind of awkward.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カムイ,ch10_35_Kamui_M_Normal,Face|No, it's not that. She just seemed
distracted, I guess. Like her mind
was someplace else.$k$p$WmMPID_アトラス,ch10_36_Atlus_M_Normal,Face|You might be onto something...$k$p
